text: Puzhal Lake also known as Red Hills lake is located in Red Hills, Thiruvallur district, Tamil Nadu. It is one of the two reservoirs from where the drinking water is drawn for Chennai city. The other reservoir is Chembarambakkam Lake. The full capacity of the lake is 3300 million cubic feet.wikimapia.org/141440/Red-Hills-Lake-செங்குன்றம்-ஏரி ==Reference== Category:Lakes of Tamil Nadu Category:Chennai district
title: Puzhal Lake
